description: These kaomojis, on the other hand use, >’s and <‘s for their low hands. This kind of bow shows how apologetic these emotes are for something they have said or done. They are definitely rising above their ego and taking responsibility for their own wrong doings. Have pity! The fact they will lower themselves to the ground is enough of a reason to recognize they are sorry and to accept their apology.  <(_ _)> ＜(。_。)＞ ≦(._.)≧ <(￢0￢)> <(．＿．)> <(*- -*)> <(＠´＿｀＠)> <(_ _<(_ _<(_ _)>_ _)>_ _)>
title: Bowing with > and < hands
